citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
***During the inspection, itineraries were discussed. The licensee stated that an employee was supposed to be submitting
them. Itineraries have not been received for at least two exhibitions. One in October 2024 at the Greater Gulf State Fair in
Mobile, AL and another for the Nueces County Junior Livestock Show in January 2025. Failure to submit itineraries
causes a lack of ability to ensure the health and well being of the animals by inspectors.
The licensee must submit itineraries, with all of the required information so they are received no less than two (2) in
advance of travel.
To be corrected from this day, January 15, 2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
***During the inspection, itineraries were discussed. The licensee stated that an employee was supposed to be submitting 
them. Itineraries have not been received for at least two exhibitions. One in October 2024 at the Greater Gulf State Fair in 
Mobile, AL and another for the Nueces County Junior Livestock Show in January 2025. Failure to submit itineraries 
causes a lack of ability to ensure the health and well being of the animals by inspectors.  
The licensee must submit itineraries, with all of the required information so they are received no less than two (2) in 
advance of travel.  
To be corrected from this day, January 15, 2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
